name: Damage Inc. Pacific Squadron WWII
description: Take to the skies in one of over 30 accurately represented aircraft and defend the Pacific Theatre from invading enemy forces.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows XP (SP2)Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 4000+Memory:1 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro, 256MB, Shader Model 3.0+ Graphics CardDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:4 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible Sound CardOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

reviews.review_text: Fun arcade style world war two flight sim. Has a large variety of planes and fun gameplay.
